Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park buses Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/ Cumberland
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving park, Cumberland and Addison due to police activity near Irving Park/ Cumberland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving park, Cumberland and Addison due to police activity near Irving Park/ Cumberland.

Allow extra travel time.
